confirmed_facts: K-íˆì–´ë¡œ CubeSat, a 3U CubeSat developed by KAIST, was launched aboard Nuri-4 on 2025-11-27 from Naro Space Center.
The CubeSat's primary mission is to validate a 150W Hall thruster in space.
Nuri-4 launch was the first KARI technology transfer to Hanwha Aerospace, marking a significant step for South Korea's commercial space industry.
